Data: Toss: Australia have won the toss and elected to bat.
Franklin to Gilchrist, 1 wide wide outside the off stump, left alone
Franklin to Gilchrist, 3 runs bit fuller from Franklin, Gilchrist drives well through covers to the deep
Franklin to Hayden, 3 runs pitched up and swinging away, driven well by Hayden wide of mid off to the deep
Franklin to Gilchrist, FOUR runs short and wide outside the off stump, Gilchrist puts it away in style, slashes it over backward-point, one bounce into the fence
Franklin to Gilchrist, 1 run
Franklin to Hayden, no run good ball this time from Franklin, held its line, Hayden covers the line and lets it go
Franklin to Hayden, no run another ball outside the off stump, Hayden watches it and lets it go through to McCullum
Bond to Gilchrist, no run good ball on target, 142 km/h, worked to the on side
Bond to Gilchrist, 1 run short delivery, gets a thick bottom edge to fine leg, looking for the pull
Bond to Hayden, no run back of a length delivery, moves slightly away from Hayden, who defends to the off side
Bond to Hayden, no run right back and pushes back down the track, 143.3 km/h
Bond to Hayden, no run
Bond to Hayden, no run
Franklin to Gilchrist, (no ball) oversteps, fuller outside the off stump, Gilchrist mistimes the drive to mid off
Franklin to Gilchrist, no run
Franklin to Gilchrist, no run
Franklin to Gilchrist, FOUR runs gets the edge, just to the right of Fleming at first slip, that was too close to body for the cut shot
Franklin to Gilchrist, no run left alone outside the off stump
Franklin to Gilchrist, no run
Franklin to Gilchrist, no run pitched up delivery outside the off stump, driven straight along the ground to Vettori at mid off
Bond to Hayden, 2 runs on the legs, Hayden gets an inside edge onto the body and then to fine leg, comes back for the second run
Bond to Hayden, no run looking to leave it alone, gets the edge along the ground to backward-point
Bond to Hayden, no run gets behind a back of a length delivery and pushes to point
Bond to Hayden, no run squares up Hayden, good delivery from Bond
Bond to Hayden, no run moves into line and lets it go outside the off stump through to McCullum
Bond to Hayden, no run beats Hayden, bit fuller and swinging away, looking to drive straight down the ground, misses it
Franklin to Gilchrist, no run back of a length delivery, Gilchrist on the back foot defends to point
Franklin to Gilchrist, FOUR runs pitched up and wide outside the off stump, Gilchrist puts it away, driven through covers to the fence
Franklin to Gilchrist, no run gets back and nudges to the on side
Franklin to Gilchrist, no run wide outside the off stump, cut away hard in the air, bounces just short of Patel at backward-point
Franklin to Gilchrist, no run well directed from Franklin, moves back and works to the on side
Franklin to Gilchrist, FOUR runs pitched from Franklin, it was in the slot, lofts it straight past the bowler to the fence
Bond to Hayden, 3 runs works it through midwicket to the deep
Bond to Gilchrist, 1 run quick single to short cover, Vettori runs in from mid off to field the ball
Bond to Hayden, no run plays to the on side
Bond to Hayden, FOUR runs full on the legs, tucked away nicely to long leg fence, bad line from Bond, probably looking for the yorker
Bond to Hayden, 2 runs on the pads once again, tucks it through midwicket
Bond to Hayden, no run bit slower from Bond, 131 km/h, left alone, on the second bounce to McCullum
Franklin to Gilchrist, FOUR runs half-volley outside the off stump, driven well through extra-cover, places it well to the fence
Franklin to Gilchrist, 1 run nudges wide of mid on for a single
Franklin to Hayden, no run pitched up delivery, driven back to the bowler
Franklin to Hayden, no run mistimes the drive to mid on, looking for the big booming drive
Franklin to Hayden, (no ball) oversteps, drifts down the leg side
Franklin to Hayden, no run lets the ball go outside the off stump, was thinking of the cut shot
Franklin to Hayden, no run once again lets it go through to McCullum, a watchful Hayden
Bond to Gilchrist, no run on the middle stump, pushes to the on side
Bond to Gilchrist, no run driven to mid off, fielded by Vettori
Bond to Gilchrist, 1 run pushes upishly to backward-point to the right of Patel who dives, just falls short
Bond to Hayden, (no ball) angled across, left alone outside the off stump, Bond oversteps
Bond to Hayden, 2 runs on the legs, flicks it behind square leg to the deep, McMillan runs around from fine leg does well to slide and stop it
Bond to Hayden, 1 run pitched up delivery outside the off stump, driven to Vettori at mid off, who misfields to allow a run
Bond to Gilchrist, FOUR runs lovely shot from Gilchrist, driven wide of mid on, the ball races to the fence, brings up the 50 for Australia in quick time
Gillespie to Hayden, 1 run nudges to midwicket to pick up a single
Gillespie to Gilchrist, 1 leg bye pitched outside the leg stump, loud appeal, given not out by umpire Rauf, they scamper through for a leg bye
Gillespie to Hayden, 4 leg byes this time on the pads, looking to glance it fine, misses, off the thigh pad to the fence
Gillespie to Hayden, no run left alone outside the off stump
Gillespie to Hayden, FOUR runs lofts it in the air over wide mid on to the fence, good shot
Gillespie to Hayden, no run defends to the on side
Bond to Gilchrist, no run moves back and defends to the off side
Bond to Gilchrist, no run good ball almost squares up Gilchrist, pushes upto mid off
Bond to Gilchrist, no run 149.9 km/h, fuller delivery driven to mid off
Bond to Gilchrist, SIX runs good shot for maximum, flicks it in the air over backward square leg fence
Bond to Gilchrist, no run defends with a straight bat back down the track
Bond to Gilchrist, no run slower from Bond, 128.6 km/h, defends to the off side
Patel to Hayden, 1 run moves back and works to the on side for a single
Patel to Gilchrist, no run good ball, beaten by the turn, pitches outside the leg stump, spins across, off the pad to the off side
Patel to Gilchrist, no run this time watchfully moves forward and pushes to backward-point
Patel to Gilchrist, no run good ball, pushes to short extra-cover
Patel to Gilchrist, no run moves back and defends with a straight bat back to the bowler
Patel to Gilchrist, 1 run gets back and cuts to deep point for a single
Gillespie to Gilchrist, FOUR runs great shot from Gilchrist, driven well in the gap between extra-cover and mid off, the ball races to the fence in quick time
Gillespie to Gilchrist, no run goes for the pull and misses, goes just over, closer to the off stump
Gillespie to Gilchrist, no run looking to work it through the on side, off the pad
Gillespie to Gilchrist, 1 run moves back and works it off his pads in front of square leg for a single
Gillespie to Hayden, no run 143.6 km/h, looking to play through the on side, misses, off the pad
Gillespie to Hayden, no run back of a length delivery, defended to midwicket
Patel to Gilchrist, 1 run tossed up bit fuller outside the off stump, driven well down the ground to long off
Patel to Hayden, 1 run pitched outside the leg stump, plays it in the air through midwicket
Patel to Gilchrist, no run moves forward and defends to cover, good bowling from Patel
Patel to Gilchrist, 1 run bit slower and fraction short from Patel, cut to deep cover for a single
Patel to Hayden, 2 runs bit fuller on the middle and leg, driven well down the ground to long on, good running fetches the second run
Patel to Hayden, (no ball) 1 run oversteps, this is bad, moves back and works through midwicket
Patel to Gilchrist, no run loud appeal given not out by umpire Rauf, it was pitched outside the leg stump, struck the pad
Gillespie to Hayden, no run moves in line and pushes back down the track to Gillespie

Gillespie to Hayden, OUT Gillespie gets the first break-through, it was short and down the leg side, Hayden looking for the pull, gets the edge through to McCullum (off the glove), who takes the catch.
Gillespie to Ponting, no run wide outside the off stump, left alone through to McCullum
Gillespie to Ponting, no run once again left alone
Gillespie to Ponting, no run
Gillespie to Ponting, no run on the off stump, driven to cover, not from the middle off the bat
Patel to Gilchrist, no run full toss driven back to Patel, drops short of him
Patel to Gilchrist, no run comes down the track and drives it back, fielded by Patel
Patel to Gilchrist, no run driven to mid on, a quick throw from the fielder, Patel taking evasive action in the back ground as the ball struck the stumps
Patel to Gilchrist, 1 run driven to the right of mid on for a single
Patel to Ponting, 1 run comes to the pitch of the delivery and drives to long on for his first run
Patel to Gilchrist, 1 run full toss driven wide of long off for a single
Gillespie to Gilchrist, no run short ball, struck on the body, looking for the pull, misses it
Gillespie to Gilchrist, no run on the leg stump, pushes it back to Gillespie
Gillespie to Gilchrist, 1 run gets a bottom edge down to thirdman for a single, Gilchrist on 49
Gillespie to Ponting, (no ball) oversteps, driven to mid off
Gillespie to Ponting, FOUR runs short and wide, cut off the back foot to cover fence, nice shot
Gillespie to Ponting, no run defends to cover on the front foot
Gillespie to Ponting, no run driven well along the ground to mid off
Patel to Gilchrist, FOUR runs gets his fifty in style, dances down the track and lofts it over mid on to the fence
Patel to Gilchrist, no run advances once again and plays to the on side
Patel to Gilchrist, SIX runs a big hit over midwicket for maximum, goes out of the stadium, lovely strike, a slog sweep
Patel to Gilchrist, 2 runs worked through midwicket

Patel to Gilchrist, OUT pitches on the middle and straightens, Gilchrist once again looking for the slog sweep, misses it completely, strikes the pad, loud appeal, umpire Rauf takes a long time and then lifts the finger.
Patel to Clarke, no run moves forward and defends on the track
Gillespie to Ponting, 1 run moves forward and opens the face off the bat and plays to thirdman
Gillespie to Clarke, no run a bouncer from Gillespie, ducks under it
Gillespie to Clarke, no run wide outside the off stump, left alone through to McCullum
Gillespie to Clarke, 2 runs pitched up outside the off stump, Clarke finds the gap to deep cover, Franklin fields it and gives it to Patel, who throws it in
Gillespie to Clarke, (no ball) oversteps, pushes to the off side
Gillespie to Clarke, no run shoulders arms to a delivery outside the off stump
Vettori to Ponting, no run comes forward and defends to cover, fielded by Marshall
Vettori to Ponting, no run moves forward once again and defends to the off side
Vettori to Ponting, no run on the off and middle, driven to mid on
Vettori to Ponting, no run moves forward in line and defends to cover, can't get it through the ring
Vettori to Ponting, no run short and flat from Vettori, pushes to the off side
Vettori to Ponting, no run comes forward and defends to the off side.
Gillespie to Clarke, no run wide outside the off stump, gets the under-edge, on the bounce to McCullum, who finds it difficult to take, not much of feet movement as he went after the ball.
Gillespie to Clarke, no run defended on the back foot to cover
Gillespie to Clarke, no run defends to the off side, good line from Gillespie
Gillespie to Clarke, no run moves forward and lets it go through to McCullum
Gillespie to Clarke, 1 run runs it down to thirdman to pick up a single
Gillespie to Ponting, FOUR runs swings it high and one bounce into the midwicket fence, good strike from Ponting, it was in the slot
Vettori to Clarke, no run moves back and prods to the off side
Vettori to Clarke, no run quicker delivery and it was flat, pushed back to Vettori
Vettori to Clarke, no run another flat delivery on the legs, worked to the on side
Vettori to Clarke, no run defended on the front foot to the off side
Vettori to Clarke, no run good ball once again, stretches forward and defends
Vettori to Clarke, FOUR runs breaks the shackles, uses his feet well and lofts it over wide mid on to the fence.&
Gillespie to Ponting, no run fuller delivery driven to mid off, fielded by Bond
Gillespie to Ponting, no run short outside the off stump, Ponting caught in two minds, just puts his bat
Gillespie to Ponting, no run times it well to covers, Ross Taylor dives to his right and makes a wonderful stop
Gillespie to Ponting, no run driven firmly upto mid off to Bond
Gillespie to Ponting, OUT it was in the slot outside the off stump, hit straight to Fleming at short cover, who takes the catch.
Gillespie to Symonds, no run digs in a short one outside the off stump, left alone through to McCullum
Vettori to Clarke, no run comes forward and quietly plays to the on side
Vettori to Clarke, no run defended to the on side
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run a touch short, moves back and drives wide of mid off
Vettori to Symonds, no run looking for the cut, chops it onto the ground, that was a close thing
Vettori to Symonds, no run defended back to the bowler
Vettori to Symonds, no run moves forward and defends to the off side
Gillespie to Clarke, no run pitched up outside the off stump, driven to cover
Gillespie to Clarke, 1 run on the stumps, worked in front of square leg for a single
Gillespie to Symonds, 1 run looking to drive through the covers, gets the edge down along the ground to thirdman
Gillespie to Clarke, 2 runs short delivery, Clarke looking to pull out of a pull shot, gets a top edge and goes in the air to fine leg, Vettori does well to run around and field
Gillespie to Clarke, no run a low full toss, driven straight to the fielder at cover, can't get it through the in-field
Gillespie to Clarke, FOUR runs moves forward and pulls to midwicket fence, it was not off the middle of the bat
Vettori to Symonds, 1 wide down the leg side, signalled wide
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run driven down the ground to long on
Vettori to Clarke, no run comes forward and watchfully defends on the track
Vettori to Clarke, no run flat delivery outside the off stump, moves back and cuts to backward-point
Vettori to Clarke, 2 runs flatter again, moves back and drives to the left of backward-point, comes quickly back for the second run
Vettori to Clarke, no run dances down the track and and defends it back to the bowler
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run moves back and cuts well to deep cover, fielded by Gillespie
Patel to Clarke, no run mistimes the cut to cover
Patel to Clarke, 2 runs turned in front of square leg for couple of runs
Patel to Clarke, no run moves forward and defends to the off side
Patel to Clarke, 1 run wide outside the off stump, room for Clarke as he cuts to deep backward-point
Patel to Symonds, 2 runs waits on his back foot and plays it late to thirdman, McMillan does well
Patel to Symonds, 2 runs again played wonderfully well, cuts it late to thirdman, picks up couple of runs
Vettori to Clarke, no run defended to the on side
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run wide outside the off stump, cut to deep backward-point
Vettori to Symonds, no run loud shout turned down, going down the leg side
Vettori to Symonds, no run comes forward and defends back down the track
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run room outside the off stump, cut to deep point
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run uses his feet and lofts it in the air to long off, falls just short of Patel.
Patel to Clarke, no run tossed up a fraction wide of off stump, Symonds leans back and runs it fine, sets off for the single, and just manages to beat the fielder's throw
Patel to Clarke, FOUR runs tossed up, down the track waltzes Clarke, getting to the pitch of it and lofting it down the ground for four, top shot!
Patel to Clarke, 1 run quicker delivery on the stumps, Clarke comes down the track and drives it to long-on
Patel to Symonds, 1 run flighted delivery outside off stump, Symonds kneels down and sweeps it away to backward square leg for a single
Patel to Clarke, 1 run short and wide, he rocks back and cuts that into the gap at point, but just the single this time
Patel to Symonds, no run flatter on the stumps, Symonds shuffles and works it to midwicket
Vettori to Clarke, no run delivery looped outside off stump, Clarke opens the face of the bat and steers it straight to the fielder at gully
Vettori to Clarke, no run full and straight on the stumps, Clarke gets forward and plays it back to the bowler
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run quicker and flatter, he rocks back and chops to gully
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run drifts down leg stumps, he turns it around the corner to bring up the 150
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on off stump, Clarke gets forward and pushes to mid-off
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run flat down the legs, and he flicks it around the corner
Bond to Symonds, 1 run short and wide, rubbish ball, and its cut away to deep backward point for one
Bond to Clarke, no run good length outside off stump with some more lift on it, and he leaves it alone watchfully
Bond to Clarke, 1 run slower ball outside off stump, looking for the yorker, which doesnt get that right, and Clarke taps it in front of point for one
Bond to Symonds, no run short and wide, Symonds opens the face and runs it to gully, where Fleming dives to his left and saves it very well
Bond to Symonds, no run and again, short of a length and Symonds runs it to a very acrobatic Fleming at gully, good stuff from the skip
Bond to Symonds, 1 run good length on the stumps, slower ball, Symonds gets forward and defends
Vettori to Symonds, no run tossed up, he drives to cover
Vettori to Symonds, no run quicker on the stumps, he defends it to the on side
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run short and wide, cracked out to the deep backward point sweeper
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run flat on the stumps, Clarke uses the feet well and chips to mid-on for one
Vettori to Symonds, FOUR runs shot! Just a fraction short but he cuts that powerfully and in the gap behind square for four
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run tossed up on off stump, he works that to midwicket
Bond to Symonds, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, he opens the face and runs it to third man for one
Bond to Clarke, 1 wide very short and wide, Clarke thinks about the pull but bails out in his piroutte, and the umpire calls it wide
Bond to Clarke, no run short and wide again, he pulls but cant connect well, theres an inside edge that bounces before McCullum
Bond to Clarke, no run hat-trick of lifters outside off stump, to which Clarke once more thinks about the pull but resists

Bond to Clarke, OUT gone! Set him up! Slower ball, just, on a good length outside off stump, Clarke cant contain his aggression and drives at it across the line, getting a leading edge that pops up straight in the air, there's calls of 'CATCH IT' and three men on the off side swoop in, but its Astle, running in from mid-off, who takes the steepler - making a tough chance look easy -
Bond to Symonds, no run good length delivery outside off, Symonds gets forward and pushes it straight to the fielder at short cover
Bond to Symonds, no run good length outside off stump, he stands and defends to the off side
Vettori to Hussey, no run good length outside off stump, Hussey tries the dab to third man but cant beat gully
Vettori to Hussey, no run tossed up on off stump, he tries the flick but cant time it well at all, ball pops up on the leg side but theres no catches in that up close
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run back of a length delivery on middle and leg, Hussey goes back and flicks it away to midwicket for a single to get off the mark
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run tossed up outside off stump, he gets forward and drives back to Vettori
Vettori to Hussey, no run tossed up on the stumps, he comes forward and works it to leg but cant beat midwicket
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run fired in on the legs, and Hussey flicks fine for one
Bond to Hussey, no run just short of a length outside off stump, Hussey has no room to cut but tries anyways, chopping it in front of point
Bond to Hussey, no run back of a length outside off stump, up on the toes he goes, running it to point
Bond to Hussey, no run good length on middle and leg with a little more lift on it, Hussey tries to work it off the hips but gets all tangled up
Bond to Hussey, no run quicker and a tad fuller on off stump, Hussey tries to manufacture a flick but has to adjust to the pace, and ends up defending back to Bond
Bond to Hussey, no run back of a length outside off stump, he hops up and runs that off the face right to Patel at point
Bond to Hussey, 1 run fired in short on leg stump and he pulls it out to Vettori at deep backward square leg
Patel to Hussey, no run tossed up outside off stump, driven to cover and wants the run, but hes sent back
Patel to Hussey, no run good quicker ball spins in and he has to defend back to Patel
Patel to Hussey, 1 run flat and short, back he goes, punching into the covers for one
Patel to Symonds, 1 run flat down the leg side, easy pickings for Symonds, who works it into the deep for one
Patel to Hussey, no run looped up on middle and off, Hussey goes back and defends it
Patel to Hussey, 1 run flatter outside off stump, he gets forward and sweeps it around the corner for one more
Astle to Hussey, 1 run good length outside off stump, run wide of gully for an easy single
Astle to Symonds, no run back of a length on off stump, Symonds stands and drives back to Astle
Astle to Symonds, no run back of length outside off stump now, and he runs that to gully
Astle to Symonds, no run good length outside off stump, driven to mid-off
Astle to Symonds, no run good length again, quicker too, and he drives back to Astle
Astle to Symonds, no run lovely! Quicker, a tad fuller, fairly rips off the scrambled seam and squares Symonds all ends up, beating the forward prod
Patel to Hussey, 2 runs swept to fine leg
Patel to Hussey, no run driven to midwicket
Patel to Hussey, 1 run played to short cover for a quick single
Patel to Symonds, 1 run driven to long on for a single
Patel to Hussey, no run defended to the off side,
Patel to Hussey, no run comes forward and defends
Astle to Symonds, 1 run short in length, driven along the ground to long on&
Astle to Hussey, 1 run moves back and forces to short cover, slight misfield
Astle to Symonds, 1 run short in length on the pads, pushes to deep mid on for a single
Astle to Hussey, 2 runs nicely played, waits on the back foot and cuts late, takes on the fielder and comes back for the second run, good running
Astle to Hussey, no run plays and misses outside the off stump, good work from McCullum
Astle to Hussey, no run good ball defended back to the bowler
McMillan to Symonds, 1 run full on the legs, worked out to deep midwicket for one
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run slow and full on off stump, Hussey leans forward and opens the face, running to third man for one
McMillan to Symonds, 1 run good length delivery outside off stump, Hussey reaches for it and drives it to the sweeper cover
McMillan to Hussey, FOUR runs good length outside off stump, down comes Hussey and he picks that up nicely over extra cover for four, shot!
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run back of a length delivery on middle and leg, Symonds goes on the backfoot and glances it to backward square leg
McMillan to Symonds, 1 run good length on off stump, Symonds drives across the line but cant beat mid-on
Astle to Symonds, no run back of a length outside off stump, run to Fulton at backward point
Astle to Symonds, 1 run fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Symonds opens the face and slices that to gully
Astle to Hussey, 1 run back of a length outside off stump, Hussey opens the face and collects one down to third man
Astle to Symonds, 1 run fullish on leg stump, worked out to the deep midwicket fielder
Astle to Hussey, 1 run back of a length, he just rocks back and punches in the gap at cover for one
Astle to Symonds, 1 run good length on the stumps, he shuffles and works it to midwicket for one&
McMillan to Symonds, 1 run flat outside off stump, no room on offer but he opens the face very late and runs it fine

McMillan to Hussey, OUT simple dismissal! An innocuous half-tracker moving away from him outside off stump, asking to be cut but what does Hussey do? He opens the face and slices that to Hamish Marshall at backward point for a dolly! McMillan gets the breakthrough, and he's cock-a-hoop

McMillan to White, no run fullish outside off stump, he gets a good stride forward and defends, but is rapped on the pads, fractionally outside the line, McMillan lets out a huge appeal but Asad Rauf is unmoved
McMillan to White, no run good length delivery on the stumps, White gets forward and pushes it straight to the fielder at mid-off
McMillan to White, no run good length outside off stump, he opens the face and runs it to backward point
McMillan to White, no run full outside the stumps, he comes forward and defends to cover
Astle to Symonds, FOUR runs fuller length delivery down legstump, Symonds makes room slogs it away to deep square leg for four, thats the 200 for Australia
Astle to Symonds, 1 run good length on middle and leg, he flicks out into the deep for one
Astle to White, no run back of a length on the stumps, he gets behind the line and defends
Astle to White, no run good length on middle and leg, worked to the onside
Astle to White, 1 run back of a length delivery on the middle and leg, White goes on the backfoot and flicks it away to mid wicket for a single to get off the mark
Astle to Symonds, 1 run fuller length delivery angling in, Symonds shuffles across and whips it away to midwicket for a single
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run tossed up on the legs, Symonds gets forward and flicks to mid-on
Vettori to White, 1 run flat on leg stump, worked into the midwicket region for one
Vettori to Symonds, no run tossed up on off stump, he gets forward and defends back down the track
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run tossed up on leg stump, flicked into midwicket for one
Vettori to White, no run tossed up, his hard into the ground in front of cover

Vettori to White, 1 leg bye tossed up on middle and off, doesnt spin away much, White tries to sweep and gets rapped in front of middle, they all go up in appeal but Rauf shakes the head, too high probably, and he was very far forward....hmmm....but a damn good shout
Patel to White, no run flighted delivery outside the off stump, White kneels down and looks to slog sweep it away, misses it
Patel to White, 1 run flat on leg, White comes down and flicks to midwicket
Patel to Symonds, no run flatter and quicker, he comes down but cant beat midwicket with the flick
Patel to Symonds, FOUR runs hammered! Flat outside off stump, its time to biff it, methinks, as Symonds frees the arms and clubs it out to deep cover for four
Patel to Symonds, 2 runs tossed up on the stumps, Symonds comes down the track and smashes it straight down the ground for a couple, but Marshall covers good ground and makes a brilliant stop
Patel to Symonds, 1 leg bye full and down leg side, flicked around the corner and he will keep strike
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run flat outside off stump, he cracks that out to the sweeper
Vettori to White, 1 run flat outside off again, and White drives into the covers
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run well bowled, looped up on off stump, Symonds comes down and looks to free the arms, but mistimes the slog with an inside edge to mid-on

Vettori to White, (no ball) SIX runs oh boy! Its a no-ball to start with, and its got too much air on it, and White plants the front foot forward and powerfully connects with the slog, sending it miles back over wide long-on for maximum
Vettori to White, SIX runs SHOT! Tossed up again outside off stump, down goes White, sending this one well over deep midwicket for half a dozen, man can this guy hit a cricket ball
Vettori to White, 1 run back of a length delivery on middle and leg, White goes on the backfoot and punches it to long-on for a single
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run looped up outside the off stump, Symonds reaches for it and drives it to sweeper cover for a single
Patel to Symonds, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, he comes down and lofts it down to long-on for one
Patel to White, 2 runs well bowled, flat on the stumps, White does well to connect this out to long-on and runs hard for the second
Patel to White, no run yorker length delivery on the stumps, White digs it out back to the bowler
Patel to White, 1 run flat on off stump, he makes room in an attempt to go over cover, but cant beat the fielder
Patel to Symonds, FOUR runs theres the fifty! Flattish on middle and leg, and he easily connects with the slam and picks up four over midwicket, well played
Patel to Symonds, FOUR runs gives it a bit more air, bad idea, and Symonds meets the ball with a murderous biff between midwicket and mid-on for four more, its paaaaarty time
Gillespie to White, 2 runs fullish outside off stump, White comes forward and drives between cover and mid-off for two out to the sweeper
Gillespie to White, no run good ball, yorker smack on the stumps, he defends
Gillespie to White, 2 runs fullish delivery angling in, White makes room in an attempt to and belt it into oblivion, but ends up with a top-edge down to third man for a couple
Gillespie to White, 1 run full outside off stump, he drives but doesnt time it cleanly, ends up with one to mid-off that brings up the 250
Gillespie to Symonds, FOUR runs too full and wide outside off stump, Symonds moves away to leg and slices it square of the wicket for four, super shot
Gillespie to Symonds, 1 run fullish delivery outside off stump, Symonds reaches for it and drives it to cover for a single
Bond to Symonds, 1 run slower, back of a length ball on the stumps, which Symonds pulls out to deep midwicket for one
Bond to White, 1 wide not what you need at this stage! A half-tracker well wide of off stump and its called wide, White just looked at it pass him and half-smiled

Bond to White, (no ball) FOUR runs he oversteps, sending it down full outside off stump, White has an almighty slog across the line and ends up with a thick outside edge that runs past everyone for four to third man
Bond to White, 1 wide terrible ball! A good length ball some three miles outside off stump, wide called duly, and thats now eight runs off one legal delivery this over...oh Bond, Bond, Bond...
Bond to White, 1 run back of a length outside off stump, White opens the face and runs it to third man
Bond to Symonds, 1 run back of a length and angled into him, but he's made so much room outside leg stump that he can only open the face and run it to third man for one

Bond to White, SIX runs see you later, you beauty! A good length ball outside off stump, White just frees the arms and heaves it superbly over deep midwicket, and it sails miles over the stands, hitting the roof and continuing out of the ground! Thats not coming back any time soon!
Bond to White, 2 runs short of a length on middle and leg, White goes on the backfoot and looks to pull it away, but top-edges between mid-on and long-on for a couple
Bond to White, FOUR runs good length outside off stump, White makes room and slices that over backward point for four more, terrific batting this
Gillespie to Symonds, 1 run fuller length delivery on off stump, Symonds comes on the frontfoot and punches it to long-off for a single
Gillespie to White, 2 runs fuller on middle and leg, White shuffles across and flicks it away to deep midwicket for a couple
Gillespie to White, no run yorker length delivery outside the off stump, White looks to chop it away, misses it
Gillespie to White, 1 run fullish outside off stump, White drives and manages to squeeze it wide of backward point for one, well bowled
Gillespie to Symonds, 2 runs good length outside off stump, Symonds opens the arms and goes square, hitting it out to deep cover for two, McMillan does brilliantly on the ropes to save four
Gillespie to Symonds, 1 run full outside off stump, Symonds gets forward and drives it to cover for a single
Bond to Symonds, 1 run back of a length on middle and off, pulled to midwicket for one
Bond to White, 1 wide aye aye aye, Bond! He opts for the bouncer that ends up too wide of the stumps and is called wide
Bond to White, OUT gone! Bond fires it in full on the stumps and White makes room outside leg stump, looking to slog it away, but can only find McMillan at a deepish midwicket

Bond to Symonds, OUT and he gets one more! Bond bowls one on a good length outside off stump, Symonds steps to leg and looks to uppercut, but ends up nibbling it through to McCullum, thats two in two for Bond

Bond to Bracken, OUT YES he can! Bond! Short of a lengh on off stump, slower too, and it beats Bracken all ends up, cannoning into off stump, and Bond's ecstatic! Superb stuff, and boy does he love it! Huge smile, eyes twinkling like a kid's in a candy shop, arms outstretched - COME TO ME he almost says as his teammates converge on him
Bond to Clark, 1 run good length outside off stump, he hops and opens the face, running it to third man for one

Bond to Johnson, 2 runs full outside off stump, Johnson makes room and connects well with the inside-out drive, placing it in the gap at cover and running hard for the second, and Australia finish on 289
Do join us for their reply in about 40 minutes - thats 2:21 local, 3:21 GMT where it will be Binoy to lead you through the first 25 overs.

So, an exciting, stop-start innings from Australia gets them to a very good total, leaving New Zealand with a lot of hard work to do. 290 is the target for them. Adam Gilchrist set the tone with a typical one-day fifty, Michael Clarke and Andrew Symonds consolidated after a few wickets, and then joined by the energetic Cameron White, Symonds took the bowlers to the cleaners. When it looked
It will be McCullum to take strike to Bracken, a slip and short midwicket close in
The first 15 overs will be crucial for the run chase. The Australians are out on the field having some last minute discussions. The batsmen walk out into the middle, Astle and McCullum.

Hi everyone, this is Binoy George back again, welcome for the run chase. New Zealand need 290 to win at 5.8 per over. Can New Zealand make this into a good contest? Stay tuned for some wonderful action........ Early on Bond got a hat-trick removing White caught at deep midwicket, Symonds caught behind and then Bracken bowled in the final over of the innings.
Bracken to McCullum, no run good ball first up, movement into McCullum, who blocks it to the on side
Bracken to McCullum, no run good ball once again, almost squared him up
Bracken to McCullum, FOUR runs this time comes out of the crease and whips it behind square leg to the fence, one hand off the handle as he played that
Bracken to McCullum, no run gets behind it nicely and defends it with a straight bat
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run down the leg side, nudges to fine leg to pick up a single
Bracken to Astle, no run fuller outside the off stump, comes forward and pushes to the off side
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run mistimes the drive to mid on
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run gets behind a short in length delivery and defends to the off side
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run good ball, a huge shout for lbw, turned down, struck the pad outside the line of the off stump
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run worked to the on side
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run pushes forward and gets an inside edge to the on side
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run good swing away, moves forward and defends to point
Bracken to Astle, no run good ball swinging in from the stumps, worked to Ponting at short midwicket
Bracken to Fleming, no run gets behind it and defends to the off side
Bracken to Fleming, 1 run on the pads, tucked to deep backward square leg, Fleming gets off the mark
Bracken to McCullum, no run wide outside the off stump, left alone
Bracken to McCullum, no run slower delivery, comes forward and defends
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, no run defended to point
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, no run 142 km/h, left alone outside the off stump, good pace from Hilfenhaus
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, 1 run full and wide outside the off stump, Fleming slices it in the air to wide thirdman
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run comes forward to an away swinging delivery and defends to cover
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run plays it off his pads to square leg, fielded by White
Bracken to Fleming, 2 runs pitched up delivery outside the off stump, driven well in the gap between extra-cover and mid off to the deep
Bracken to Fleming, no run defended to the off side
Bracken to Fleming, no run gets in line and defends with an open face to backward-point
Bracken to Fleming, 1 run runs it down to thirdman to pick up a single
Bracken to Taylor, no run short in length angled across, lets it go through to Gilchrist
Bracken to Taylor, no run gets in line on the front foot and defends with the full face off the bat to mid off
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, no run good ball on target, defends straight back down the track
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, no run lets it go outside the off stump
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, 1 run pushes in front of point, Clarke runs across and fields the ball
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run good ball short in length, defended to cover, fielded by Symonds
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run on middle and leg, forced to midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 1 run gets the outside edge wide of the slips to thirdman
Bracken to Taylor, no run moves forward and drives firmly upto mid off
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run pushes to mid on for a quick single, the fielder was a bit deep, it was Hussey
Bracken to Fleming, no run good ball on target, comes forward and defends to cover
Bracken to Fleming, no run comes forward and defends to the off side
Bracken to Fleming, 1 run good ball angled in, nudges behind square leg to pick up a single
Bracken to Taylor, FOUR runs good shot from Taylor, width outside the off stump, moves forward and drives well to cover-point fence
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, no run on the off stump, defended to Symonds at cover
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, 1 wide swings down the leg side, signalled wide
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, no run on the off stump line, jabbed to point
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, SIX runs flicks it in the air over square leg fence for maximum. Good shot it was well picked up, it was full on the legs
Hilfenhaus to Fleming, 1 run fuller once again, driven to mid off to Hussey
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run good slower delivery, Taylor watches it and works to midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 1 run works it from off stump to deep square leg
Bracken to Taylor, no run forces it on the up to cover, can't it get it out of the in-field
Bracken to Taylor, no run fuller on the off stump line, looking to force it through, hit straight along the ground to mid on
Bracken to Taylor, no run short in length outside the off stump, bit wide, has a waft at it and gets beaten
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run forces on the front foot to cover for a single
Bracken to Fleming, no run good ball on target, moves forward and pushes to mid on

Johnson to Fleming, no run pushes upishly to cover, the ball seemed to have stopped on the track
Johnson to Fleming, no run 142.6 km/h, left alone through to Gilchrist
Johnson to Fleming, no run short in length, plays out to point, kept a bit low
Johnson to Fleming, no run fuller on the legs, flicked in front of square leg, White in quickly prevents the single
Johnson to Fleming, no run good ball outside the off stump, walked into it, pitches and moves away, beats the outside edge
Johnson to Fleming, 2 runs swinging away, pushes through the covers to the deep
Bracken to Taylor, no run on the off stump line, defended to point, fielded by Clarke
Bracken to Taylor, no run looking to force it down the ground, lot of bottom hand as he went for the drive, mistimes it
Bracken to Taylor, no run watchfully defended to mid off
Bracken to Taylor, FOUR runs cracking shot from Taylor, square drives it between backward-point and cover-point to the fence, lovely placement
Bracken to Taylor, no run goes after a wide delivery outside the off stump, this time he misses it, through to Gilchrist, who is standing up at the wickets
Bracken to Taylor, no run drives on the up to Symonds at covers

Clark to Fleming, FOUR runs full and wide outside the off stump, slices it high in the air over backward-point to the fence, was looking to go down the ground.

Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs pulls it on the up to midwicket fence, good shot that from Taylor
Johnson to Taylor, no run beaten outside the off stump
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs another good shot, lofted over midwicket, picked up quickly by Taylor, striking very well here
Johnson to Taylor, no run on the off stump, defended to cover
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs another beautiful shot from Taylor, it was full outside the off stump, lovely timing through to the left of backward-point to the fence. Third boundary in the over
Johnson to Taylor, no run pushes on the front foot to the off side
Clark to Fleming, no run dabs it to backward-point, Fleming sets off for a single, sent back

Clark to Taylor, no run on the off and middle, short in length worked to midwicket, Fleming was backing up, Ponting misses the stumps at the non-striker's end

Clark to Taylor, FOUR runs nicely played from Taylor, works it past the short fine leg, the ball races to the fence, good wrist work.
Clark to Taylor, no run full length delivery driven to midwicket
Clark to Taylor, no run good yorker dug out by Taylor back to Clark, well bowled and well played
Clark to Taylor, FOUR runs beautiful shot from Taylor, in the slot, driven straight along the ground to long on fence, Taylor playing well
Clark to Taylor, 1 leg bye full and on the legs, strikes the pads, loud appeal turned down, as the ball was going down the leg side, they go through with a leg bye
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run short in length, works to midwicket for a single

Johnson to Taylor, no run yorker on the stumps, dug out to the on side

Symonds to Taylor, 1 leg bye stretches forward and looks to work it through the on side, misses, strikes the pad, loud appeal turned down, they go through with a leg bye

Clark to Fulton, SIX runs lovely strike from Fulton, short delivery picked up nicely and pulls it well over backward square leg fence for maximum.
Clark to Fulton, no run nudged to Ponting at midwicket

Symonds to Taylor, SIX runs Shot! a slog sweep, swings it high and over the midwicket fence for maximum. Wonderful strike that from Taylor, he looks to have pulled his muscle as he went for the shot.
Symonds to Taylor, no run pulled to square leg

Clark to Taylor, 1 run fullish outside off stump and he works it across the line for one more into mid-on, all wrists on that shot

Clark to Fulton, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, and Fulton pulls impetuously through the line, picking up one to square leg

Symonds to Taylor, 1 run a tad fuller on middle and leg and he chips it into the air on the leg side, but mid-on's too deep and the ball falls safely
Symonds to Fulton, 2 runs short of a length down leg , Fulton goes back and whips it away to backward square leg for a brace
Symonds to Fulton, 1 wide another rubbish delivery, angled well wide of leg stump and more work for the 'keeper

Hilfenhaus to Fulton, FOUR runs dragged in short, Fulton swivels quickly and pulls through square leg and midwicket, Hayden out in the deep runs forward and dives, right-hand outstretched, but gets no where near it and thats four
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run fuller length delivery angling in, Fulton gets right behind and looks to defend it, inside edge onto the pads

White to Taylor, SIX runs looped up on off stump, Taylor gets into position to slog sweep it again, doesnt time it all that well, getting under it, but has enough forearm power to heave it over deep midwicket for half a dozen, that ball was in the air for a long, long time
White to Taylor, 1 run drifts down the legs and its worked to square leg for one

Hilfenhaus to Fulton, 3 runs fuller length delivery outside the off stump, he leans into the shot and drives it out to extra cover
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run another attempted off cutter becomes a low full toss which Taylor doesnt pick at all, and is lucky not to chop onto his stumps

Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run good length delivery outside off stump, Fulton reaches for it and drives it to short cover

Johnson to McMillan, no run back of a length outside off stump, played out to backward point
Johnson to McMillan, no run slower and a bit fuller, his feet dont really go anywhere and he closes the face of the bat as he defends back to Johnson
Johnson to McMillan, no run good length on off stump, again he anxiously plays it back to Johnson, but the head and eyes were headed somewhere else
Johnson to McMillan, 2 runs short of a length outside off stump, played out past backward point with some confidence this time
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run back of a length on middle and off, Fulton goes back and drives to mid-on

Hilfenhaus to McMillan, no run good length on the stumps, driven back down the ground and he fields with the outstretched right hand

Hilfenhaus to McMillan, OUT low full toss on off stump, he flicks across the line past midwicket, quickly comes Clarke from the deep, who moves, picks it up and throws it straight onto the nonstriker's end, and gets his man! He didnt have a lot to work with, moving and throwing it on the turn, and looking at one stump, but his brilliance does the rest! McMillan cant believe it, and
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, 1 run fullish on off stump, and he flicks it into midwicket for one
Hilfenhaus to Vettori, no run good length on the stumps, Vettori gets behind the line and defends, uneasily
Clark to Fulton, no run back of a length on off stump, he drives and gets an inside-edge to the on side
Clark to Franklin, no run good length outside off stump, he watches it carefully and shoulders arms
Clark to Franklin, no run back of a length on middle and off, he plays loosely at it and ends up running it to backward point
Clark to Franklin, no run back of a length outside off stump, Franklin punches to Ponting at cover
Clark to Franklin, 1 run slightly shorter this time, and he hops and punches off the backfoot to mid-off
Symonds to Franklin, no run from around the wicket to the left-hander, looped up and he flicks to mid-on
Symonds to Franklin, 1 run flat outside off stump, driven to point
Symonds to Vettori, 1 run flatter trajectory on middle and off, Vettori shuffles and turns it fine for one
Symonds to Franklin, no run tossed up, Franklin drives back to Symonds, who fields well moving to his left
Symonds to Franklin, 1 run tossed up outside off stump, and he drives in the gap at cover for one
Symonds to Vettori, no run back of a length delivery on middle and leg, Vettori goes on the backfoot and glances it to short fine leg
Clark to Franklin, 1 run strives for the yorker but its in the wrong spot, and Franklin drives to mid-off
Clark to Vettori, no run good length outside off stump, he stands and goes fishing, just wafting the bat at it

Clark to Vettori, OUT as the run rate soars, Vettori chances his arm but holes out to deep square leg! Clark drops one in short of a length on middle and leg, and Vettori swivels and chips it off the pads in the air out to deep square leg, where Hayden, moving from a deepish mid-wicket, covers ground and holds a relatively easy catch
Clark to Franklin, 1 run good length on middle and leg, he flicks around the corner out to Hilfenhaus at fine leg for one
Clark to Bond, no run slower ball, on a fullish length on off stump, and he drives back to Clark

Clark to Bond, 1 run back of a length just outside off stump, Bond defends away from his body and the outside edge runs along the ground to third man, looked like he may have intentionally played it late with the open face, but who's to say, its a tail-ender, after all
Symonds to Bond, no run tossed up outside off stump, driven to cover
Symonds to Bond, 1 run good length delivery outside off stump, Bond comes on the frontfoot and shoulders arms to it

White to Patel, no run quicker delivery on the stumps, Patel gets right behind and defends it solidly

White to Gillespie, 2 runs fullish delivery on leg stump, he gets forward and flicks it away to backward square leg for a couple more
White to Gillespie, no run quicker through the air, and full outside leg stump, Gillespie looks to flick but the ball dips on him and he falls over in the shot
Symonds to Patel, no run fullish on off stump, flicked to midwicket, no chance of a run
Symonds to Patel, FOUR runs tossed up outside off stump, and the No. 11 just picks that up and slams it over mid-on for four

Thats all we have for you today, folks, but do join us for our continued live coverage of the third match of this tri-series, between England and New Zealand at this same venue, on Tuesday, January 16. This is Jamie Alter, also on behalf of my co-commentator, Binoy George, signing off and saying thanks for tuning in. Cheers, all!
Symonds is the Man of the Match for his allround efforts.

Ricky Ponting has given another consummate profession display from his bowlers and fielders, and he rotated the changes well, as we saw with the options of Mitchell Johnson, Cameron White, and Symonds. In all, it was the usual story we've seen for much of the past few seasons - Australian dominance.

New Zealand were always under the gun, and their batting just folded on an ideal batting deck. Ross Taylor played another mature innings for his young age, battling with cramps in his left leg, but a lack of support from his teammates ultimately ruined New Zealand's chances of getting close to their target. Its shocking that only two other batsman made it to double figures, and this is an

Australia surge to another victory, having outclassed New Zealand in every facet of today's game. The batting clicked, and the level-headed were able to recover after a brief wobble at the top and get it together in good nick at the tail, especially Cameron White and Andrew Symonds, and despite Shane Bond's hat-trick in the 50th over - he became just the second New Zealand bowler to do so
Australia won by 105 runs
Player of the match is Andrew Symonds, AUS
